website_summaries.verdict: The wearable Polk Boom speaker is cool, but its sound is pretty underwhelming.
pros: The Polk Boom Bit is a tiny water-resistant Bluetooth speaker that outputs a reasonable amount of sound and can be clipped on to your clothing
It has a built-in USB charger so you can plug it into your computer or USB wall power adapter
Works well as a personal speakerphone
cons: Sound is serviceable, but not all that good

customer_reviews.title: Great device for the right application
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a bike computer that does not have a built in speaker. It would also be useful for something with inadequate volume since you can place it close your ear. In my case, I clip it, using the built in clip, to my bike jersey and it functions flawlessly. I have not used it for much longer than 90 minutes, so I can't speak to full battery life, but it is plenty long for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre battery life
customer_reviews.text: If you play it at full volume, you will get 45-60 minutes from this cute light speaker. If you play it about 1/3 to 1/2 volume, then you probably get 90-120 minutes. Good sound quality. I wish it had a better battery life. I use it when I work in the yard and just clip it my collar. I bought an extra so I could change it out when the battery dies. I have bought 5 of them for gifts to others. I think it is a good price for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Renee from Columbia, MO

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. Sound only ok
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Battery doesn’t last long and the sound is that of a very small device. Kind of like your phone sound all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: 2-handed operation
customer_reviews.text: Takes 2 hands to operate. Max volume is not enough unless you have it close to your ear outdoors so I might as well just wear some good earbuds. Not what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: TodayMom

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound from such a tiny speaker. Works perfect for short runs or bike rides. Haven’t used past 45 minutes so I can’t speak to battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Qbanpete

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clip on while working in the yard. Disappointing battery life. I've never had it last more than around 70 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Child's toy at best
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material construction, very short battery life and not so responsive button operation. This should sell for around $10; definitely not $29.

customer_reviews.title: Functionality is poor.
customer_reviews.text: Only 30 minute battery life. On/off takes two hands and 10 seconds. Disconnects from Bluetooth often and need to reconnect.
